title: going through a series of confusing things

thread.content: so i am going through a series of confusing things at this time i am not good dealing with stress it'll has hit me at once its a weird situation i just need some advice and tips i feel really weird hope someone understands not being a bring down i just dont have a person to run too when im in these type of situations.
thread.author: ev19

thread.content: But you NEED someone to talk to.... counselor? Religious figure? Friend? Relative? YOU NEED TO "cultivate" a person or persons to "run to"....meaning just talk to. It is necessary for mental health. For now,health departments have mental health counselors....???? Best, Dr.Kim
thread.author: Dr. Kim Crawford
